name: Authelia

name: Blockcerts

name: DFDC Deepfake Challenge
description: Training and inference pipeline for the Facebook Deepfake Detection Challenge dataset.

name: FaceForensics
description: Dataset and benchmark code for detecting manipulated face videos and images.

description: Multi-language cryptography SDK with safe defaults for signing and encryption.

name: Hyperledger Grid
description: Framework for supply-chain data models, product catalogs, and provenance.

name: in-toto

name: Keycloak

description: Modern, easy-to-use cryptographic library for signatures, encryption, and hashing.

name: Open Badges Validator Core

name: OriginTrail
